sense.gloss: to tear up, to tear off, to rip up, to tear to pieces
to (forcibly) separate (a couple, family, etc.), to force apart, to tear apart

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑姉↑↓あね↓がその↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓を|ひきさく|のを↑見↑↓み↓た。
sdata.e: I saw my sister tear up the letter.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓がその↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓を↑引↑↓|ひ↓き↑裂↑↓さ↓く|のを↑見↑↓み↓た。
sdata.e: I saw him tear up the letter.
